title: Priority permitting process for renewable energy projects
context: [§196-1.5 Priority permitting process for renewable energy projects.] All agencies shall provide priority handling and processing for all state permits required for renewable energy projects. For purposes of this section, &ldquo;agencies&rdquo; means any executive department, independent commission, board, bureau, office, or other establishment of the State, or any quasi-public institution that is supported in whole or in part by state funds. [L 2007, c 205, §3] Cross References For similar provisions, see §§46-19.4 and 226-18&copy;(10).
